arts.ttl: Confirmed Lineups: VfB Stuttgart vs. Sparta Prague
arts.sum: The team sheets for this evening's 2024/25 UEFA Champions' League duel between VfB Stuttgart and Sparta Prague have been released.

arts.ttl: DFB overturns Karazor's red card and suspension
arts.sum: Atakan Karazor's red card against Wolfsburg has been overturned by the DFB. This means he will not be suspended for this weekend's match against Hoffenheim.
Finishing runners-up to Bayer Leverkusen last season, VfB Stuttgart secured a return to European football. And tonight, they host a Champions League game at the Neckarstadion for the first time…

arts.ttl: VfB Stuttgart’s Atakan Karazor chooses to represent the Turkish national team
arts.sum: Sky Germany reports that VfB Stuttgart midfielder and captain Atakan Karazor has chosen to represent Turkey at international level. The Essen-born midfielder will honour the country of his parents despite Germany…

arts.ttl: VfB Stuttgart vs Sparta Prague: Preview, predictions and lineups
arts.sum: Champions League football returns to Stuttgart for the first time since 2010 as the Bundesliga outfit welcome Sparta Prague to the MHPArena on Tuesday evening. Here is 90min's guide to Stuttgart vs Sparta Prague in the Champions League on Tuesday.

arts.ttl: Champions League predictions: Tuesday's matchday 2 fixtures
arts.sum: Inter, who made a huge statement on matchday one by stifling Man City at the Etihad Stadium, will expect to kick on and consolidate with Red Star Belgrade at home. Looking to get off the mark for the season, Manchester City travel to Slovakia to face Slovan Bratislava, while another heavyweight in Barcelona are home to Young Boys of Bern.
Aidan Perkins runs through all 18 fixtures on Matchday Two in the new League phase of the Champions League with a score prediction for each game.

arts.ttl: VfB Stuttgart vs. Sparta Prague: UEFA Champions League team news, match stats & LIVE blog!
arts.sum: VfB Stuttgart are hoping to earn their first points in the league phase of this season’s UEFA Champions League when they welcome Sparta Prague to the MHP Arena on Tuesday (kick-off: 6.45pm CEST). Head coach Lars Friis’s men have enjoyed a good start to the 2024/25 campaign and currently sit second in the Czech Chance Liga on 22 points after nine games.
